title: Britain's Revolut prepares for 2025 India launch, FT reports
description: Revolut set up in India in 2021 but did not receive in-principle approval from the country's central bank to issue prepaid cards and wallets until earlier this year, the newspaper reported.
content: Britain's Revolut is preparing to launch its services in India next year, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday.  Revolut set up in India in 2021 but did not receive in-principle approval from the country's central bank to issue prepaid cards and wallets until earlier this year, the newspaper reported.
